title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Definition and concepts stability, Stability theorems. linear systems an stability criteria; Classification of systems; Stability of conservative, pseudo-conservative; gyroscopic and circulatory systems; Direct variational methods of stability analysis; Multiple parameter stability theory and its applications.
